Go on a world tour: I would start by flying over the Himalayas, the Grand Canyon, and the Great Barrier Reef. I would also visit the ancient city of Petra in Jordan and the floating markets of Bangkok. I would end my tour by flying over the majestic fjords of Norway and the breathtaking landscapes of New Zealand. Confidence score: 0.8

Explore the Amazon rainforest: I would use my newfound ability to fly to reach remote areas of the Amazon rainforest and witness the incredible biodiversity of the region. I would fly over the canopy of the forest, spotting exotic birds and animals, and even visit indigenous tribes. Confidence score: 0.9

Help in natural disaster relief: I would use my flying ability to reach areas affected by natural disasters such as hurricanes, earthquakes, and wildfires. I would fly over the affected areas, assess the damage, and drop off relief supplies such as food, water, and medical aid. Confidence score: 0.95

Start a flying school: I would teach people how to fly by providing flight lessons and training programs. I would specialize in teaching people how to fly using their own body weight and energy, and I would also offer aerial yoga and meditation classes. Confidence score: 0.85

Become a flying circus performer: I would join a flying circus and use my newfound ability to perform death-defying stunts and tricks. I would fly through hoops, perform acrobatic maneuvers, and even fly while balancing on a tightrope. Confidence score: 0.9
